Developer Terms of Use
des: Are you ever bored and not sure what popular anime to watch/binge? Simply ask Alexa for an anime suggestion and you will be given a popular anime to enjoy.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
